description:
With this app you can download & browse the presentation schedule of the 27th Chaos Communication Congress (27c3) in Berlin.

New in 0.1.4:
* Rendering fix for time column
* Highlighting of current time
* Feedback page got progress indicator
* Retain scroll position on orientation change

New in 0.1.2:
* Fix for displaying very long lectures
* Eventually understood and fixed meta-tap issue

New in 0.0.8:
* Bugfix for marking lectures

New in 0.0.7:
* Mark lectures by meta-tapping them to plan your individual program
* Open feedback page in web view (feedback site will be available during conference)
